pr_title: Remove misleading default config entries from 'hazelcast-default' files

timeline.message: Remove misleading default config entries from 'hazelcast-default' files

timeline.bodyText:
Could you remove this one as well and keep just
<aws enabled="false">
</aws>

?
timeline.author: leszko
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,10 +55,6 @@
                 </member-list>
             </tcp-ip>
             <aws enabled="false">
-                <access-key>my-access-key</access-key>
-                <secret-key>my-secret-key</secret-key>
-                <!--optional, default is us-east-1 -->
-                <region>us-west-1</region>
                 <!--optional, default is ec2.amazonaws.com. If set, region shouldn't be set as it will override this property -->
                 <host-header>ec2.amazonaws.com</host-header>
